Name: File System - Create File
Description: Creates a file under specified directory and write given content.

Parameters.Name: FileName
Parameters.Label: File name with extension to create on the file system.
Parameters.HelpText: Valid file name to be created under given path.

Parameters.Name: Path
Parameters.Label: Folder path under which specified file to be created.
Parameters.HelpText: Specify folder path, where you wish to create specified file.

Parameters.Name: Content
Parameters.Label: Content you wish to write on newly created file.
Parameters.HelpText: Content you wish to write on newly created file.
